settings.title: Meet our Portland crew
settings.text: Whether it's running, dancing, yoga, pilates, boxing, or trampolining - we all loveÂ moving, and believe that movement heals your soul. We are a dynamic crew of likeminded folks who care about the wellness of others in our community. We love partnering with other locals for events and collaborations, and are always open to new ideas. We focus on bringing people together in our space where everybody is always welcome.

settings.title: High Quality and Mindful Products

We aim to provide you with support, ease and confidence
so you can stay connected and focused on your yoga practice.

settings.title: Will Xpand Laces work on my shoes or boots?
settings.answer: Xpand Lacing System works on all types of shoes - from kids shoes, adults sneakers, Timberlands to high-top boots.

settings.title: Are the Xpand Laces adjustable?
settings.answer: Yes! Finding the perfect fit is easy with Xpand Laces. We recommend trying out the length before you trim the laces. Always set the initial adjustment on the loose side, so that you can always tighten them up if needed.

settings.title: How long are the laces?
settings.answer: Xpand Laces are 52 inches long, and can stretch out to over twice that length, which makes them long enough for all types of shoes or boots.

settings.title: What is your return and exchange policy?
settings.answer: Xpand offers a 90 day satisfaction guarantee. If you are not 100% satisfied for any reason, we will refund your order. No questions asked!
